sentences.english: Simaqian is one of the greatest historiographers who has spiritual freedom .
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷是一個具有自由精神的偉大的歷史學家。

sentences.english: Sima Qian visualized this feat as blazing the path into the west regions.
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷把這一歷史性的壯舉形象地描繪爲“鑿空”。

sentences.english: This story appears in the Historical Records Written by Sima Qian.
sentences.chinese: 這個故事載自司馬遷寫的《史記》中。

sentences.english: Sima admires to die a martyr's death but not to give up one's life carelessly.
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷讚賞慨然赴死的勇氣，但反對隨意地放棄生命。

sentences.english: The remarkable is Sima Qian's one of the dominant feature.
sentences.chinese: 愛奇是司馬遷創作心態的主要特徵之一。
